text: The Blood Barrier is a 1920 American silent drama film directed by J. Stuart Blackton and starring Sylvia Breamer, Robert Gordon, and William R. Dunn.Britton p. 9 ==Cast== * Sylvia Breamer as Enid Solari * Robert Gordon as Major Robert Trevor * William R. Dunn as Eugene Solari * Eddie Dunn as Eddie Brown * Louis Dean as Zu Paven * Margaret Barry as Madame Marechek * Gus Alexander as 'Left' ==References== ==Bibliography== * Wesley Alan Britton. Onscreen and Undercover: The Ultimate Book of Movie Espionage. Greenwood, 2006. ==External links== * Category:1920 films Category:1920 drama films Category:American films Category:American drama films Category:Films directed by J. Stuart Blackton Category:American silent feature films Category:English- language films Category:Pathé Exchange films Category:American black-and-white films
title: The Blood Barrier
